message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you greatly.
Alice,  $22,000 is significantly higher than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product but I can't go above $8,000. This is my final offer.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $22,000 is already a significant reduction from my initial asking price.  Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
